Reviews.Title: “Awesome!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: sungal21
Reviews.Content: Family trip are always fun and we all enjoyed the hotel. Staff were extremely helpful with Everything, and I mean EVERYTHING! Go out of there way type people. We booked 2 queens, however upgraded one of them to a king which included a sofa, and microwave. Pool had kids occupied for hours, they had fun thats all that matters. Clean rooms, comfy beds, no noise, HBO, and great location... you cant go wrong.

Reviews.Title: “rooms need better maintenance”
Reviews.Author: Richard P Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Towel racks, hair dryer etc. fell from wall. Check in took excessive amount of time. Room was satisfactory for price paide.

Reviews.Title: “Bring earplugs”
Reviews.Author: Soren K Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: A very rinky-dink place with 8 huge buildings (about 160 rooms or so total). A hard bed, breakfast seating for about 12 people for everyone to have breakfast at, horribly-isolated walls (you could literally hear every footstep outside), and quite unclean to boot. Doesn't sound too good so far, right? Well, then there's the price... The pros: It's very cheap, location is great, and there's a nice sandwich/pizza-shop across the street. If you are just in town for a few nights, it's fine really, just bring earplugs and you'll be set.

Reviews.Title: “Not bad for the price”
Reviews.Author: Javier M Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: The hotel have a good location, but there are better options for the same price or cheaper, even with newer facilities, it's an old hotel, need more maintenance!! I would recommend it only in emergencies while getting another hotel

Reviews.Title: “nasty”
Reviews.Author: Belen T Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: It was a terrible experience..It was so dirty the room was non smoking n it smelled a lot like smoke..The rooms were so dirty there was rat poop it was gross..Don't stay in that hotel..

Reviews.Title: “Much better than I expected”
Reviews.Author: barbarawwarren
Reviews.Content: We needed an inexpensive hotel when our motor home broke down. Parkside was clean, no odors, no bugs, and very helpful management. Few extras -- TV's were old, no little bottles of shampoo, no continental breakfast, but it did have wi fi and HBO, as well as a swimming pool which was also clean. It is a family-run business and they really care.

Reviews.Title: “value for money...cheap accom.”
Reviews.Author: shirazsplash
Reviews.Content: You don't expect the ritz at the prices they charge and you are not disappointed. Had a pleasant stay, made better by an attentive staff and facilities that worked. The place is a bit tired, but clean and a very comfortable bed.

Reviews.Title: “One night was one night too much!”
Reviews.Author: devon4
Reviews.Content: The only good thing was clean sheets and we did sleep good, but a 12-hour car ride could do that to anybody. Couldn't find anyone to turn in the key to the next a.m. Supposed to receive continental breakfast; never saw any food other than my own. Ice machine was broken. In-room refrigerator wasn't plugged up if we wanted to use it - no thanks since signs posted stated a charge for in-room refrigerator. Used my disinfecting wipes on EVERYTHING before we touched anything. Pool looked clean, but didn't take time to try it out. Needed a room for one night before heading onto WDW property for the week. Stayed elsewhere last year and wished we'd have gone back. Certainly a value, but then again, you get what you pay for!!

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for...good thing you aren't paying much”
Reviews.Author: BSMinNY
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were trying to do Florida/Universal/Florida on the cheap, so we decided to give this place a try, as we got a rate of $27/night. Well, you get what you pay for. This place was in serious need of some updating. Our room badly needed a fresh coat of paint, the dresser drawers really didn't work, and there was some mold on the bathroom ceiling. Overall, the place was relatively clean, just old. The front desk staff was pleasant, but beware Southwest Airlines passengers, the front desk staff had no idea what we were talking about when we asked if they could print our boarding passes (thankfully the kind people at guest services at the Disney Hollywood Studios printed them for us, for free!). The location of this hotel was relatively convenient, 10 minutes to Disney, 20 minutes to Universal. I don't know that I would stay here again, I think I would try one of the other $35/night hotels on W Irlo Bronson in the future. Not a terrible experience, but certainly nothing to brag about either.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfy, Brilliant - great value for money!”
Reviews.Author: sungal21
Reviews.Content: I was put off at first by the reviews on trip adviser but I went onto other websites and found more reviews, and when you compare them, the good by far out weigh the bad! So I went ahead and booked for 1 week, and absolutely loved it! It was comfortable, parking was to my door, wi-fi worked great, the person next to me could not get on at first but eventually did... I booked because a friend had a great experience here with her family and said the rooms were very clean, and house keeping comes in everyday. Yes so some things are out dated, and the breakfast could be a little better, but that didn't bother me as I'm not paying for it, its complimentary. I loved the swings and the little animals out front, adds a little coziness.The staff were nice, responsive and extremely knowledgeable, they helped me with transportation, and sold me discount tickets to the parks. Overall we liked the hotel, enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend it to friends and family. Another thing 2 days into the stay the bath tap began leaking, but was fixed the same day we reported it.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Quite and Safe!”
Reviews.Author: twforl
Reviews.Content: I was amazed by a couple reviews I read about Record Parkside Inn in Kissimmee - a very clean motel I usually stay at while in town. I have never seen a single bug, every room I have been in has smelled fresh and clean, security is not really a issue, no need to lock your car and you park feet from your room, very nice pool - one of the reviews I read complained about the water not being warm enough - well this is Florida, why would anyone want a pool with warm water?? I think it is family owned, staff makes sure I am happy and will go out of their way to ensure I do not have any problems - their internet connection is A++, I seem to get more work done here - very quite and comfortable. The price is about the same as other motels in the area, but the quality is much better, there is a little store just across the street, plenty of spots to eat, Disney is just a few miles to the west, palm trees, swings & chairs all over the property, there is even a orange orchid in the back.

Reviews.Title: “Stay Away Record Parkside Hotel”
Reviews.Author: daveschoices09
Reviews.Content: If You have plans of visiting the Orlando/Kissimmee Area, plan on by passing the Record Parkside Hotel By. The Staff Is Extremely Uncaring To Customers Needs and Are Very Rude, Crude, and Just Plain Out Uncaring To Customers Needs. The Ice Machines Don't Work, And When We Complained They Told Us Ice Is Not Promised To Their Customers. Stay Way Clear of This Hole In The Wall.

Reviews.Title: “This motel is very basic”
Reviews.Author: Dragmeback
Reviews.Content: Have stayed at this hotel before but this time noticed a significant change in cleanliness, amenities and service. The "heated" pool was cold and full of sand that had been tracked in from the parking lot. It was cold enough we were unable to use it except on very hot days. The washroom needed to be updated, taps dripped and the lighting was poor due to the age of the fixtures. Water has a peculiar septic type odor. In general the entire motel furnishings and bedding are tired. Maid service was erratic. Bought our own toilet paper and not enough towels.

Reviews.Title: “Worth the stay”
Reviews.Author: junkdude53
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Record Parkside on the night of 28 March. It's a older hotel which is family operated. Their service and support to our little group was outstanding. We arrived at 9:30PM, they found us a couple more rooms for our extra players. They went out of their way to help settle us in and make us comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Can't beat this place for price and cleanliness”
Reviews.Author: JWB43
Reviews.Content: We drove up to Orlando from Fort Lauderdale to go to Epcot and Cirque. Right before we left we found this motel here on tripsavers. The price $39.50 TOTAL could not be beat and the reviews were good so we thought "lets do it". I'am so glad we did, this place is a hidden gem, its no frills mind you but I can't remember the last time I was in a motel room that was so clean. The owners are wonderful and our check in was quick and pleasant. We stayed in the two story side of the motel in a second floor room. The room was very big and nicely furnished, everything clean as a whistle. The decor is hodge podge but its done nicely, very shabby chic. There are three channels of HBO plus tons of other stations, the pool was sparking clean and the place was so quite at night, we didn't hear a sound after we went to bed. The location is good and you can walk to places close by or by car in a less then 5 minutes to new shopping centers, eating places, the Buena Vista Outlet Mall and Epcot and Downtown Disney are 15 minutes if that. I will stay here again the next time we go up, it was perfect.

Reviews.Title: “We Came Back”
Reviews.Author: MarsFKA
Reviews.Content: My wife and I made our first trip to Florida in July, 1998, and found this motel before we left New Zealand by surfing the accommodation web sites in the area. We stayed here for eight nights and had no problems at any time. The rooms were clean and well serviced and the whole feel of the place was that it was a well-run establishment. At the time, I operated a motel of my own, so I was, and still am, sensitive to these requirements. Five years later, almost to the day, we stayed there again, on our second Florida trip. It is nice to go back to a place and find that it is just as you remember it - even down to the little concrete animals on the lawn. The bonus, for us, was when we told the young lady at check-in that we had stayed there five years before, she gave us a repeat-business discount. If we return to Kissimmee, we will stay at this motel without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “Beware of Parkside Inn misleading advertisements”
Reviews.Author: Meteor25
Reviews.Content: During the first night the toilet stopped and never was fixed (Thanks God I didn't used it too much). I booked my reservation on the internet with my credit card and during the check out they charged me another rate (higher) not the one offered on the internet. I had to file a complaint at Consumer's Affairs in order to get a credit. If you don't want to have a very bad experience and ruin you vacations don't stay in that motel.

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly nice, but don't expect five-star quality”
Reviews.Author: flayrah
Reviews.Content: I had a last minute business trip to Orlando during Spring Break/Easter season, so most hotels I looked at were either sold out or at the highest high-season rates. I came across some reviews for Record Parkside and thought "how bad can it be"?, considering there are some major hotels in the area that guests report are dirty, dismal and downright frightening. When I first checked in, I could see the hotel was old, probably built in the 1970's (or even 1960s), pre-Disney. But from the outside everything looked clean and cared-for, very similar to the 'Mom and Pop" motels our family would stay at on road trips when I was a kid. The room itself was just your average motel room - bed, dresser/television and bathroom. There is certainly some wear around the edges, but nothing significant. Then, as my trip continued, I noticed how CLEAN everything was. No dust, no spots, no stains. Sure, there is rust on the mirror frame; the towels are thinning; and there have been some 'creative' handyman repairs, but I didn't worry about things crawling on me at night, or find any mold in the shower. I would say, it's a lot like staying at a family members' house, that you haven't seen for a while. Everything is clean, they are welcoming, but you can't help notice some things that you would 'never' do if you had guests over! lol I would easily stay here again, and best of all, even though it was Spring Break, everything was quiet and generally peaceful. There seemed to be mostly older, retired types staying here, and not until my last night - a Friday - did I notice some more colorful characters. The one thing I didn't realize is the motel is on a major tourist highway, so you're surrounded by cheap shops and attractions. But the rooms themselves are set back about 100 feet or so from the highway, so while traffic can be rough, excess noise was not a problem.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The only thing keeping me from giving this the highest ranking is that the first 3 days we were there the heater in the pool was broken. This is a family run motel and everybody there treated us like family too. The hotel was spotless inside. Is a 4 star hotel? No, but it's $39 a night and was better than the hotel we stayed at coming home which was $79. You're within a few blocks of Target & Wal-Mart. You can buy all of your attraction tickets in their office. It's less than 10 minutes from Disney World. Just our youngest son and I went - this summer, all 4 of us will be staying here!

Reviews.Title: “Will always stay with them”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We was remembered from the first time we stayed with them, and have always found them to go out of their way to help with anything.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: 4Goldfish
Reviews.Content: stayed here in Dec 02. Staff friendly, rooms spacious and spotless. Pool rather cool at this time of year. Enjoyed our stay even the vegetarian bbq. Will be back

HotelInfo.Name: Record Parkside Inn and Suites
HotelInfo.Address: 4651 West Irlo Bronson Highway (Us 192), Kissimmee, FL 34746
